The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) on March 1 said that three rapid COVID-19 tests shouldn’t be used because of the potential for producing false results.

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: Sanctions have sharply raised chance of a Russian default, JPMorgan warns - CNN
articles.description: Russia's stock market remains shut down. The ruble is worth less than a penny. And Western businesses are fleeing. JPMorgan warns a Russian default could be next.
